SELECT `province` AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM lm_order WHERE `province` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY `province`
SELECT `channel` AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM lm_order GROUP BY `channel`
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM lm_order AS u WHERE created_time > #{gmtStart} GROUP BY `key`;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `key`, sum( pay_price ) AS `value` FROM lm_order AS u WHERE pay_price IS NOT NULL AND created_time > #{gmtStart} GROUP BY `key`;
SELECT id, order_no as orderNo FROM lm_order WHERE `status` = #{status} AND updated_time < #{time}
